tag_professor: Get ready to read (3)  Hilarious (2)  Participation matters (2)  Tough Grader (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)
comments: Darling lady and is always willing to work with you. This class is hard though, and the tests require a lot of studying. Tested on material that we weren\'t taught, and that test questions were worded hard. This class is doable though if you are willing to put in time to really understand. She likes students that ask questions. Save $, Use ebook.

tag_professor: Get ready to read (3)  Hilarious (2)  Participation matters (2)  Tough Grader (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)
stu_tags: HILARIOUS  SKIP CLASS? YOU WON\'T PASS.
comments: Teaches through powerpoints and assigns textbook assignments. Really easy and fun class. Focus on studying directly from the powerpoints.

tag_professor: Get ready to read (3)  Hilarious (2)  Participation matters (2)  Tough Grader (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)
stu_tags: PARTICIPATION MATTERS  GET READY TO READ
comments: She is a nice lady but she isn\'t very helpful. You use the book a ton, for example: the final you\'ll need it. Whatever you get there is no way to help raise the grade so be sure to study for tests, do every learnsmarts, and be there for every surprise quiz because they help your grade.

tag_professor: Get ready to read (3)  Hilarious (2)  Participation matters (2)  Tough Grader (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)
stu_tags: GET READY TO READ  PARTICIPATION MATTERS
comments: She is a nice lady but she isn\'t very helpful. You use the book a ton, for example the final you\'ll need it. Whatever you get there is no way to help raise the grade so be sure to study for tests, do every learnsmarts, and be there for every surprise quiz because they help your grade.

tag_professor: Get ready to read (3)  Hilarious (2)  Participation matters (2)  Tough Grader (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)
comments: We have tests every other week, sometimes more often. She goes over the material pretty well, but you definitely need to study out of class. I study for about an hour for each test, and usually get a B. It\'s interesting stuff. She is a hilarious teacher, she\'s so funny.

tag_professor: Get ready to read (3)  Hilarious (2)  Participation matters (2)  Tough Grader (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)
comments: Material is VERY difficult. Great teacher. Very helpful and fun. In class explanations really help - drawings and comparisons are great learning tools. Curves each test to give students better grade. Several online assignments: food journal, etc. You\'ll need flashcards and study time for this class.

tag_professor: Get ready to read (3)  Hilarious (2)  Participation matters (2)  Tough Grader (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)
comments: Demaree Johnson\'s class can be difficult if you don\'t study the material that she offers. Her class is very interesting and she is clearly very knowledgeable of this topic. She is an enthusiastic, happy, bubbly teacher who tells fascinating nutrition stories. Just use the lessons, power points, and study guides along with the learn smarts!

tag_professor: Get ready to read (3)  Hilarious (2)  Participation matters (2)  Tough Grader (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)
comments: Just study the power points. She gives you way more info than you need to pass the class.

tag_professor: Get ready to read (3)  Hilarious (2)  Participation matters (2)  Tough Grader (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)
comments: I studied my butt off every week! Her class was the hardest class I took getting my generals.

tag_professor: Get ready to read (3)  Hilarious (2)  Participation matters (2)  Tough Grader (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)
comments: She\'s funny, makes class interesting. However, keep in mind this is a low-level nutrition class so questions you ask that deviate from the material, it doesn\'t seem she has the answers to. Attendance isn\'t mandatory, but it really helps pass the tests.

tag_professor: Get ready to read (3)  Hilarious (2)  Participation matters (2)  Tough Grader (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)
comments: Really a great professor. She was funny in class and used humor to a good advantage. She is organized and always had assignments graded and back the next class. She made difficult concepts easy to understand. I learned so much in this class that will be useful forever. Take nutrition from her!!

tag_professor: Get ready to read (3)  Hilarious (2)  Participation matters (2)  Tough Grader (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)
comments: She was great. I really enjoy learning through powerpoints that go alongside with the book and her lectures were so interesting! I found this class easier than most because I find nutrition fascinating, but as long as you read the book and pay attention to the lectures you will do great in her class!

tag_professor: Get ready to read (3)  Hilarious (2)  Participation matters (2)  Tough Grader (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)
comments: Nice lady and great, great teacher. She makes a 3 hour class fun and worthwhile.

tag_professor: Get ready to read (3)  Hilarious (2)  Participation matters (2)  Tough Grader (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)
comments: If you are scared of not passing Biology, take this class. It is extremely easy to get a B or a C. She uses powerpoints and the book. A little stubborn, which is funny when nutrition isn\'t a complete science anyway. Sometimes mixes up stuff in class accidentally. Not amazing.

tag_professor: Get ready to read (3)  Hilarious (2)  Participation matters (2)  Tough Grader (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)
comments: She\'s actually very knowledgeable in the subject matter, and she presents it well. I can\'t say the same for some of the teachers in the FCS building. I\'ve heard people say that the class is hard or the tests unclear... but of all my classes... She has probably been the most clear. And nutrition isn\'t really that hard. People astound me.

tag_professor: Get ready to read (3)  Hilarious (2)  Participation matters (2)  Tough Grader (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)
comments: The best teacher. Is very helpful and makes nutrition fun.

tag_professor: Get ready to read (3)  Hilarious (2)  Participation matters (2)  Tough Grader (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)
comments: She is anything but clear. Ask her a valid question about nutrition and she says, "That\'s just how it is"--well it really isn\'t; she just doesn\'t know and will not admit when she is wrong. If you have any sense of logic in yourself, this woman will make your brain explode with fallacy. She has been blatantly wrong in grading tests. Do not take.

tag_professor: Get ready to read (3)  Hilarious (2)  Participation matters (2)  Tough Grader (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)
comments: She is really nice. She tells a lot of stories that are pretty funny/interesting. I enjoy her class a lot. She tells you exactly what you need to know for the quizes and tests.

tag_professor: Get ready to read (3)  Hilarious (2)  Participation matters (2)  Tough Grader (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)
comments: Demaree is an awesome nutritiom teacher. She is maily does slides in her class, and if you take all of your notes off of them you are guarunteed to do well on her tests. She is really nice and really helpful.
